Stephanie Alicia Chen is an artist and designer, who studied through the University of Southern California’s Roski School of Art and Design and the University of Virginia School of Law. She combines her legal skills and artistic passions to lead creative change into peoples’ lives.

Stephanie’s award-winning artwork has been exhibited at Downtown Los Angeles’s Artwalk, Glenn & Viola Walters Cultural Arts Center in Oregon, and published in Scribendi, a creative magazine of the University of New Mexico and the National Collegiate Honors Council. She has also displayed in various galleries and art fairs throughout Minneapolis-St. Paul and Duluth, Minnesota. Stephanie was the featured artist and licensed her work for the University of Southern California’s Women’s Conference.
